model

Class CalendarRecurringEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.CalendarEvent
      • model.CalendarRecurringEvent

  • public class CalendarRecurringEvent
extends CalendarEvent
    This subclass of CalendarEvent is used for events that recur at a regular interval
    Author:
    Joseph Acevedo

    • Constructor Detail

      • CalendarRecurringEvent

        public CalendarRecurringEvent(java.lang.String title,
                              java.util.Date date,
                              java.util.Date start,
                              java.util.Date end,
                              java.lang.String id,
                              int interval)
        Constructs a new recurring event object
        Parameters:
        title - title of the event
        date - Date object with the current date, zero out the time
        start - Date object with the start time/day
        end - Date object with the end time/day
        id - unique id string
        interval - number of days between repeat events

        Returns all of the occurances of this event between the given dates
        Parameters:
        start - The start date of the window
        end - The end date of the window
